RelatedSentence: The National Youth Education Network of Liberia and A World at School Global Youth Ambassadors are hosting a massive rally on Monday , May 26 , in solidarity of their fellow sisters abducted in Nigeria last month .
Islamist militant group Boko Haram in April captured and kidnapped more than 200 schoolgirls in Nigeria demanding ransom for their release .

The National Youth Education Network of Liberia and the Global Youth Ambassadors are staging the mass rally to present a petition to the Nigerian Government through its embassy near Monrovia calling on the government to take firm actions to bring back the girls .

The rally according to the National Youth Education Network of Liberia is tagged We want no Barriers to Education and Bring Back Our Girls .
The young people said every child has the right to education , protection and freedom and that the kidnapped of the Nigerian schoolgirls is a complete violation of their right .
